data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Sanmenxia.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sanmenxia, Henan, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Sanmenxia that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.section_summary: On average, 21 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sanmenxia, Henan, China.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Sanmenxia, Henan, China.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Please, teach the 21,582 believers in Sanmenxia, Henan, China how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 258,321 who are far from you in Sanmenxia, Henan, China from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Sanmenxia, Henan, China that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Sanmenxia, Henan, China.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight
